query:
SELECT 
  id,
  customerId,
  amount,
  paymentMethod,
  status,
  transactionId,
  createdAt,
  completedAt
FROM recharges
WHERE customerId = 480001 AND amount = 120
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1
